parameters: Oh, sorry, I just suddenly started feeling
nostalgic, y'know. Maybe because I'm more
attached to the library than the castle,
this place is recreated in far more detail.
Miss Tahati was a librarian, yes?
Now that I think about it, yeah, probably.
At that time, I just thought I was
entrusted with the duty of managing books.
This is the castle's library, hm.
So, in short... you're pretty awesome, huh?
No, I've nothing to do with this castle.
I was only called here because of my
She's always been an excellent magician, huh?
Oh, enough praise! You won't get rewards
if you kept complimenting me, alright?
I don't mind if you'd rub my breasts, though.
Can we proceed forward from here?
I'm pretty sure ahead's a dead end.
It's my Memory Space, after all.
For now, let's have a look around.
Even if there is no path forward, we
have to find everyone who's gone lost.
Being here reminds me of something.
That day, I had a fateful encounter...
...Oh, it's not a romantic story, alright?
I wasn't interested in that kind of thing.
This place resembles the Hunter-Hunter's home.
So many books I don't understand...
There's nobody else in this library,
So you were here after all.
I have come from above, correct.
This staircase... is operated by a
mechanism at the top, which I happened
However, it seemed to not take
kindly to the influence of Thunder.
It's great that the stairs popped up,
but what if it got stuck there!?
No, I get that you're sincere,
Come now, at least it didn't happen.
By the way, Valco, are the others
There was a door, but it wouldn't open.
Then Tahati would be able to open it.
...Can I assume that those who are not
present here have not been found?
Ah, except for Kann, of course.
Miss Tahati, there's a door in the
upper floor that cannot be opened.
I'm sure I can open it, then.

parameters.text:
Among the attributes, Light is a mystifying one.
　　　It not only illuminates the darkness,
　　　but it can also heal and affect time.

　　　And the mysterious Star Magic must be
　　　the apex of the Light attribute.
